<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-043c-4290-2321-66dc8d872edb#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Santa Costanza boltozata, 4. század, Róma.</string>
            <string language="en">The vault of Santa Constanza, 4th century, Rome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wölbung von Sankt Constanza, 4. Jahrhundert, 
Rom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La chambre forte de Santa Constanza, 4ème 
siècle, Rome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O vault de Santa Constanza, ô século, Roma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La volta di Santa Constanza, quarto secolo, Roma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο υπόγειος θάλαμος Santa Constanza, 4$ος αιώνας, 
Ρώμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cámara acorazada de Santa Constanza, 4to 
siglo, Roma</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Santa Costanza szentélykörüljárójának boltozata igen gazdag az ókeresztény kor ornamentikális ábrázolásában.</string>
            <string language="en">The vault of encircling aisle of the Santa Costanza is very rich in ornamentical representation of the paleochristian era</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Santa. Contanza,  ornamentika,  4. század,  Róma,  </string>
            <string language="en">Santa Constanza, ornamentation, 4th century, Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wölbung des Umkreisens des Ganges der Sankt 
Costanza ist in der ornamentical Darstellung der paleochristian Ära 
sehr reich</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La chambre forte d'encercler le bas-côté de la 
Santa Costanza est très riche en représentation ornamentical de 
l'ère paleochristian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O vault de encircling o corredor da Santa Costanza
é muito rico na respresentação ornamentical da era paleochristian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La volta di circondare la navata della Santa 
Costanza è molto ricca di rappresentazione ornamentical dell'era 
paleochristian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο υπόγειος θάλαμος της περικύκλωσης του διαδρόμου του 
Santa Costanza είναι πολύ πλούσιος σε ornamentical 
αντιπροσώπευση της paleochristian εποχής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cámara acorazada de cercar el pasillo del 
Santa Costanza es muy rica en la representación ornamentical de la 
era paleochristian</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sankt Constanza, Verzierung, 4. Jahrhundert, Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Santa Constanza, ornement, 4ème siècle, Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Santa Constanza, ornamentation, ô século, Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Santa Constanza, ornamentation, quarto secolo, Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Santa Constanza, διακόσμηση, 4$ος αιώνας, Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Santa Constanza, ornamentation, 4to siglo, Roma</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
